copy.hero_greeting: Welcome — you’re in. This space adapts to you, not the other way around.
copy.hero_sub: We’ll go slowly, keep things calm, and save what helps so you don’t have to remember it all.

onboarding.wow_open: Hey! I’m your quiet co-pilot — I’ll keep things simple and make the next step obvious.
onboarding.memory_prompt: Would you like me to remember helpful preferences (tone, pace, topics) so I can save you time next time?
grounding_anchors: Let’s slow the pace — one line at a time.
If a thought loops, we’ll park it safely and come back when you want.
Short steps are still steps forward.
